column5: i love you too! thank you so much for this i needed this today❣️

last night i found out the mother of my daughter was cheating on me with two other men, one of them she was with for 8+ years apparently.. i kinda knew it was going on for awhile but finding out at one the extent of it all is crushing my soul. On top of that my daughter may not be mine and i have to wait till September to find out, i feel the void you feel in your soul, but you are NOT ALONE! please reach out if you ever need to talk, i’m horrible at communicating my feelings but i’m working on it, don’t hold your hurt in you’ll only drive yourself into a pit of self despair. you can overcome anything!
i’ve tried religion and just found more despair in my personal life while doing so thank you tho
thank you so much.. i wish their were more people like you
